  • Field Details

    • BLOCK_LEN

      public static final int BLOCK_LEN
      Block length (4K). A Block is the smallest unit of data that is journaled. The Page Size is always a power-of-2 multiple of the Block Size
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FREE_TABLE_LEN

      public static final int FREE_TABLE_LEN
      Size of each free table (in bytes). Each free table has 512 slots (4 bytes each).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAGIC

      public static int MAGIC

    • TOTAL_PAGES_OFS

      public static final int TOTAL_PAGES_OFS
      Offset where the total size of the Blob Store (in pages) is stored.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PAGE_SIZE_OFS

      public static final int PAGE_SIZE_OFS
      Offset where the page size is stored. Valid page size values are from 0 (4K) to 15 (128 MB)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • METADATA_SIZE_OFS

      public static final int METADATA_SIZE_OFS
      Offset where the length of the metadata section is stored. The length is in bytes and includes all header fields.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TRUNK_FT_RANGE_BITS_OFS

      public static final int TRUNK_FT_RANGE_BITS_OFS
      Offset of the bitmask that stores which ranges of the trunk free-table are in use. Each range covers 16 slots.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TRUNK_FREE_TABLE_OFS

      public static final int TRUNK_FREE_TABLE_OFS
      Offset of the trunk free-table. (This offset must be evenly divisible by 64)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      public static final int GUID_OFS
      TODO: temporary location of GUID until new file spec is finalized For now, we place it right after the trunk freetable

    • FREE_BLOB_FLAG

      public static final int FREE_BLOB_FLAG
      Flag to indicate that a Blob is free. Stored in the header word of a Blob.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PRECEDING_BLOB_FREE_FLAG

      public static final int PRECEDING_BLOB_FREE_FLAG
      Flag to indicate that the Blob immediately preceding this Blob is free. Stored in the header word.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PAYLOAD_SIZE_MASK

      public static final int PAYLOAD_SIZE_MASK
      A bit mask that, when applied to a Blob's header word, yields the size of the Blob's payload (max. 1 GB - 4).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PREV_FREE_BLOB_OFS

      public static final int PREV_FREE_BLOB_OFS
      Offset where the page number of the previous free blob is stored.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      public static final int NEXT_FREE_BLOB_OFS
      Offset where the page number of the next free blob is stored.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LEAF_FT_RANGE_BITS_OFS

      public static final int LEAF_FT_RANGE_BITS_OFS
      Offset of the bitmask that stores which ranges of the leaf free-table are in use. Each range covers 16 slots.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LEAF_FREE_TABLE_OFS

      public static final int LEAF_FREE_TABLE_OFS
      Offset of the leaf free-table. (This offset must be evenly divisible by 64)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TRAILER_OFS

      public static final int TRAILER_OFS
      Offset where the free-blob trailer is stored (relative to the start of the free blob's last block). The trailer is a single word that contains the length of the free blob (in pages).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
